textBeforeTable: Comments: Also we fixed news@gna.org so a few of you will receive the first Gna! news by e-mail after a long hiatus :] As previously mentionned the system now uses configuration management allowing automated reinstalls, and we even share the recipes - 100%-free-hosting spirit :) http://svn.gna.org/viewcvs/admin/trunk/puppet/ dl.gna.org & home.gna.org was reinstalled with Debian Wheezy 64-bit. Let us know if there's any issue.
